attributes.review: i got this app as a joke. once i first opened the app i saw a scary fat orange man on the screen. i FREAKED out and screamed. his face scares me. i threw my phone across the room but surprisingly it didnt break. i then turned my phone back on and there on my lock screen was a picture of the fat cheeto man once again i screamed. my mom was rly confused on why i was scring so much so she came up stairs to my room and asked what was wrong. i told her the big orange cheeto man scared me. then all of a sudden my mom started levitating. then she got yeeted across the room and then the orange cheeto man busted down my bedroom door with his 1 inch pp out 👁👄👁. the n i grabbed my phone and started screaming and he was chasing after me. then i knew that it was the app doing all of this so i deleted it. and then everything stopped. SO what im saying is DO NOT GET THIS APP OR THE FAT NAKED CHEETO MAN WILL COME AFTER YOU. have a nice day 👹🥰💞👑💫✨😻
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS 👹👹

attributes.review:
the story of a real life Y/N; 
yes, you read that right. i was sent to the hospital because of this ATROCIOUS app. i will NEVER be getting this app again and WILL NEVER be voting red. i am absolutely TRAUMATIZED!!! i have ptsd 😡❤️ let me lay the story out for you, shall i? it was misty tuesday morning, leaves blowing, chickens cocka-doodle-doodling, and my brunette hair was up in a messy bun. my bright blue orbs opened wide as i had a thought. ‘why not download this app?’ WORST MISTAKE OF MY LIFE!! just minutes after downloading the app, i noticed a sharp pain in my left eye socket. naturally, i screamed and my ab*sive mother ran down the stairs (this story takes place prior to selling me to one direction btw🙈) and she brought me to the hospital. the doctors took SPOONS and spooned out my eyeballs. i now have no eyeballs. therefore i am blind. anyway go donate to my gofundme so i can get some new eyeballs ❤️
attributes.title: sent me to the hospital!!!! (not clickbait)(gone sectual😳)

attributes.review: String theory, in particle physics, a theory that attempts to merge quantum mechanicswith Albert Einstein’s general theory of relativity. The name string theory comes from the modeling of subatomic particles as tiny one-dimensional “stringlike” entities rather than the more conventional approach in which they are modeled as zero-dimensional point particles. The theory envisions that a stringundergoing a particular mode of vibration corresponds to a particle with definite properties such as mass and charge. In the 1980s, physicists realized that string theory had the potential to incorporate all four of nature’s forces—gravity, electromagnetism, strong force, and weak force—and all types of matter in a single quantum mechanical framework, suggesting that it might be the long-sought unified field theory. While string theory is still a vibrant area of research that is undergoing rapid development, it remains primarily a mathematical construct because it has yet to make contact with experimental observations.

attributes.review: i downloaded this app, because i was so excited to support my sexy president😻! but all of the sudden, as soon as i opened the app, my phone was hacked and started beeping like crazy😾. it then started vibrating and giving me pop up ads for the extremely dangerous campaign, that i think was called #SaveBarronTrump. 👎 my trump flags and posters changed to the campaign’s awful posters right before my eyes!🙀 as a fellow trump supporter, i was very disappointed that my president created an app to have such strange and extreme consequences. 😿 i’m not sure if i will ever be able to hang these trump2020 posters and flags back up after this traumatizing experience. i’m sorry and ashamed to have supported such a horrible person. i believe in change and i think we should definitely move on from (what the kids call) this awful “boomer.” 😸 goodbye😛😝😜😣🤧😹💋🙊🍊

attributes.review: before you gen z’s come for me, i am a proud christian mother and stepmother to 7 beautiful children, so you can assume that i love trump. well, i did, up until now. i wanted to support my president in any way i could to get a second term. but lately, i’ve noticed mr. trump has been lacking, and me downloading this app was the LAST STRAW!!!!! as soon as i downloaded the app, i had to go through the process of making an account, which i believe is holding me back on info from donald!! then, when i did make an account, the app kept crashing!!! i couldn't even open the app due to this. even after deleting and reinstalling, it still did this after the sign up page. but, my friend had also downloaded this app, and let me tell y’all they must have hired a 12 year old to design this thing. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU ARE A REAL REPUBLICAN MOTHER LIKE ME!!!! 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
